reviews.title: It\'s cool.
reviews.comment: I check gas prices and store specials before I leave the house.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but needs work
reviews.comment: I like the app for the sales, and gas prices.  I wish it would notify when gas prices change without having to open the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Specials!
reviews.comment: Love this app! They give coupons and specials!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update issues
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t load properly when new deals are offered. Nice to know the months specials!
reviews.author: Aaron Littlejohn

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: This app is really nice.  I can check the gas prices before I leave the house and the coupons to save money on items in the store is also I nice touch.
reviews.author: A Google User
